channel.title: Watch out its a nub scammer!
channel.description:
This guy made a post in the scar scripts section trying to say he was giving a scar script that had a free lvl 97 username and pas in it. Look at our conversation:
[code] Akriam says: hey!!! jordan says: u want to find the account>? Akriam says: LIKE YES! jordan says: your like the 3rd person it's kinda like a puzzle jordan says: ok jordan says: i'll send it to you at your emial jordan says: or whatever jordan says: it's a puzzle Akriam says: lol if its a dl im not stupid jordan says: well Akriam says: you have 4 posts if its a dl its obviously a virus jordan says: you just download the scar program jordan says: with the script or whatever Akriam says: just send the scar script to me Akriam says: ill paste it into scar jordan says: i don't know how Akriam says: just copy the script and send it jordan says: just download what i have i'm giving it away lol Akriam says: Virus! Akriam says: im reporting you jordan says: watever you say buddy jordan says: it's not but whatever Akriam says: no really just copy and paste it jordan says: i already gave to 3 people Akriam says: just do it that way jordan says: i don't know how jordan says: i'm a flaming nub lol jordan says: i just coppied the whole thing jordan says: it should work Akriam says: left click with your mouse and click *copy* Akriam says: or click the icon on top of the scar thing Akriam says: of press CTRL+C jordan says: i already tired that Akriam says: then it should work jordan says: i know it like wont let me or something jordan says: nooo jordan says: that's like a virus ur making me do jordan says: ur giving me like a virus or something Akriam says: fine ill download it, how big is it? jordan says: it's the usuil scar program thing Akriam says: i know how many Kb is it? jordan says: i couldn't get the srl though idon't understand it Akriam says: fine. answer my question, how big is the file? jordan says: like 1.2mbs iw ath it said Akriam says: no scar script is that big... Akriam says: is it maybe because it has a keylogger attatched? jordan says: omg Akriam says: ??? jordan says: i told u it's the whole scar program Akriam says: Just Send the script then jordan says: what's a keylogger? jordan says: omg jordan says: your going to like give me a virus Akriam says: I cant give you a virus for something yo do... jordan says: i'll send you what i have i don't understand it very well though Akriam says: then how did you script it? jordan says: well jordan says: i don't know that Akriam says: That doesnt make sence... jordan says: i just doont want to get a virus Akriam says: YOU CANT GET A VIRUS FROM COPYING SOMETHING [/code]
By the way I knew it was a scam I was just being difficult.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 10:39:06 PM[/size][hr]Also their were huge pauses in between it all, he had to think what to say:
[Code] jordan says: ok jordan says: well i'm sending it to you jordan says: at your hot mail [/Code]
I may be wrong, but its 1.2MB for a script and he seems ignorant...

item.title: Watch out its a nub scammer!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote="#1killa, post:9, topic:28145"]humm look at this

jordan tried to send you a file (inst_scar.exe). This file has been blocked because it is potentially unsafe.
[/quote]
All .exe files in Msn are potentially unsafe. You either need to zip, rar or upload them elsewhere to send them.
